title: Warn when multiple VS installations are detected and MSBuild is forced to guess
body: This was proposed but not implemented in #1461. It still seems like a good idea, especially with the [Visual Studio Preview](https://www.visualstudio.com/vs/preview/) program making it more likely for end users to have >1 VS installed.

nodes.body: Thanks for pointing this out in https://github.com/OmniSharp/omnisharp-vscode/issues/1438#issuecomment-298075467, @DustinCampbell.
Superseded by https://github.com/Microsoft/MSBuildLocator (where `RegisterDefaults()` was a mistake, but I digress).
